en.title: Livyana
en.text: The Livyana Mobile App extends community access to smartphones, allowing users to join discussions, groups, and forums anytime, anywhere. It delivers real-time push notifications, resource sharing, and caregiver support tools to keep members engaged. All activities are seamlessly synced with the web platform, ensuring a unified experience across devices.

en.title: Fulfilly Flyers
en.text: The Fulfilly Mobile App empowers drivers and customers with on-the-go access to delivery updates and services. Drivers can easily locate parking and charging stations, manage delivery routes, and stay connected in real time. Customers benefit from live tracking, timely notifications, and a smooth, eco-friendly delivery experience, ensuring convenience anytime, anywhere.

en.title: Pleat
en.text: Pleat is a React Native mobile app designed to simplify the traditional saree draping process. Our team of experts pre-pleat and box sarees, making them portable, easy to carry, and hassle-free to drape. The app allows users to explore services, book pre-pleated sarees, and enjoy a seamless experience that blends tradition with modern convenience. With Pleat, achieving the perfect saree look is effortless, elegant, and time-saving.

en.title: MyBuddy
en.text: The Mybuddy Mobile App brings an engaging community experience to smartphones, making it easy to connect on the go. Users can explore communities, create “Buds” (posts), and interact with content through likes, comments, and reactions. Designed with React Native, the app delivers a seamless, real-time social experience that keeps users connected anytime, anywhere.

en.title: HDD manager
en.text: Hdd Manager Mobile is a React Native app designed to help users manage their hard disk storage with ease. The app allows you to monitor usage, track available space, and organize files efficiently. It also provides secure backup and restore features, ensuring your data is always safe and easily recoverable. With a clean and user-friendly interface, Hard Disk Mobile simplifies storage management right from your smartphone.

en.title: Job Board
en.text: JobBoard Mobile connects students, alumni, and college management in one platform. Alumni can share job opportunities with students, while admin offices handle queries via help desk. The app also supports events, posts, job boards, and member directories. Built with React Native, it enables a seamless on-the-go campus community experience.

en.title: Padane
en.text: A fully-featured productivity app developed with React Native, enabling users to organize tasks, notes, and projects across multiple devices. It offers cloud sync, intuitive UI, and collaboration features.

en.title: Zen Wellness Lounge
en.text: Zen Wellness Lounge Web App lets users join online and offline yoga and meditation sessions. It offers free and paid programs, story-sharing sessions, and alumni mentorship. Paid sessions include a smooth ticket booking flow for hassle-free registration. Built with Next.js, ShadCN UI, and Redux Toolkit, it promotes holistic wellness anytime, anywhere.

en.title: Sree Thangam Jewellery
en.text: Sree Thangam Jewellery Web App allows customers to explore a wide range of jewellery collections, view product details, and place orders online. It provides a seamless browsing and shopping experience with easy navigation and secure checkout. Built with modern web technologies, the platform ensures an elegant and user-friendly interface.

en.title: Nobleset
en.text: Noble Set Web App is an e-commerce platform where customers can explore various product categories, browse collections, add items to abundant carts, and complete secure checkout. It also supports drop shipping imports and provides a seamless shopping experience with order tracking and responsive design.

en.title: Prade
en.text: Prade Jewellery Web App is an e-commerce platform where customers can explore various product categories like jewellery, rings, and bracelets, add items to the cart, and complete secure checkout. Users can track orders and enjoy a seamless shopping experience powered by modern web technologies.

en.title: Fulfilly
en.text: The Fulfilly Web App enables businesses and customers to access eco-friendly delivery solutions powered by electric vehicles. It offers seamless services for parking and charging, logistics, warehousing, last-mile commute, and intra-city deliveries. Built for scalability and convenience, the web platform ensures uninterrupted service while promoting sustainability.

en.title: Livyana
en.text: The Livyana Web App brings together patients, caregivers, healthcare professionals, and advocacy groups in a secure and customizable community hub. It enables collaboration through forums, groups, and discussions while providing an analytics dashboard to measure engagement. With role-based access and a user-friendly interface, organizations can create meaningful spaces tailored to their needs.

en.title: Gyanodhayam
en.text: The Gyanodhayam Education Trust Web App shares knowledge on yoga, meditation, art, science, and spirituality to guide individuals toward self-realization and enlightenment. It provides access to classes, resources, and teachings that help people lead a disciplined and noble lifestyle. The platform fosters spiritual growth while encouraging users to balance societal duties with inner awakening.

en.title: BKS Fabrics
en.text: BKS Fabrics is a leading textile solutions provider with vertically integrated facilities, from yarn dyeing to finishing. We deliver premium woven fabrics, hospitality linens, and stylish workwear. Our modern South India plant uses green energy and advanced technologies for efficiency and quality. With continuous innovation, we remain a one-stop destination for evolving fashion and textile needs.

en.title: Tirumalai
en.text: Tirumalai Textiles is dedicated to sustainable fashion, embracing eco-friendly practices and recyclability. With prestigious GRS certification, we ensure our yarn production meets the highest global standards. We recycle garment waste to manufacture premium textile yarns with minimal environmental impact. Our mission is to deliver exceptional quality yarns tailored for both domestic and international markets.

en.title: kpr mill
en.text: KPR Mill is one of the largest vertically integrated, publicly listed textile companies with over 40 years of excellence. Our diversified business spans yarn, fabrics, garments, and white crystal sugar. We produce a wide range of premium textiles including knitted apparel, fabrics, and multiple yarn varieties. With global reach, we are committed to superior quality, timely delivery, and sustainable growth.

en.title: Sree Thangam Jewellery
en.text: The STJ enables role-based management of products, orders, and customer interactions. Admins can update collections, track sales, and handle inventory efficiently. It ensures smooth business operations while providing insights for better decision-making. The panel simplifies overall store management with real-time control and reporting.

en.title: Covai Civil Lab
en.text: Covai Civil Lab Pvt. Ltd. is a NABL-accredited premier testing facility with 40+ years of expertise in material testing and structural evaluation. We follow BIS standards to ensure uncompromised quality and safety. Our services span from material testing to stability certifications, supporting infrastructure, industrial, and academic projects. Trusted nationwide, we deliver excellence for every build.

en.title: CRM
en.text: Our CRM system empowers businesses to manage customer relationships efficiently with lead tracking, sales pipeline management, and automated follow-ups. Built for scalability, it offers role-based dashboards, analytics, and real-time reporting. With seamless integrations and user-friendly design, it enhances collaboration across teams. Designed to improve customer engagement and boost sales performance.

en.title: Prade
en.text: The Admin Panel enables complete management of products, orders, categories, attributes, and stock. It supports discounts, coupons, refunds, and media storage via AWS S3. Admins have full control over e-commerce operations, ensuring smooth inventory management and sales tracking.

en.title: Fulfilly
en.text: The Fulfilly Admin Panel provides a powerful dashboard for managing day-to-day operations. Admins can track drivers’ live locations, monitor daily handled orders, and manage outsourcing requests. The panel also supports full control over drivers, vehicles, and orders to ensure smooth logistics. With real-time visibility and detailed insights, Fulfilly simplifies fleet management and optimizes delivery performance.

en.title: Nobleset
en.text: The Admin Panel allows admins to manage products, orders, categories, and stock while overseeing staff members and their roles. It includes tools for handling discounts, refunds, coupons, and generating detailed reports. With features like abundant cart management and drop shipping import, the panel ensures efficient business operations and analytics.

en.title: Zen Wellness Lounge
en.text: The Admin Panel provides role-based access for admins, students, and alumni. Admins can manage sessions, track participants, and handle ticket bookings for paid programs. It ensures smooth coordination of wellness activities and mentorship initiatives. The intuitive panel simplifies session management and supports the lounge’s holistic wellness mission.

en.title: kpr mill
en.text: The KPR Mill Admin Panel streamlines operations across yarn, fabric, garment, and sugar divisions with centralized management. It enables real-time tracking of production, inventory, and quality control to ensure efficiency. Role-based access supports admins, managers, and staff for smooth collaboration. With integrated reporting and analytics, it empowers data-driven decision-making across the enterprise.

en.title: Alumni Portal
en.text: The JobBoard Admin panel provides role-based access for admins, faculty, and students. Admins manage users and postings, faculty guide students, and students explore opportunities. It ensures smooth collaboration, event participation, and alumni networking. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, the web app powers a secure, scalable platform.

en.title: Temple Management
en.text: The Temple Management System is a comprehensive digital platform designed to streamline daily temple operations and community services. From managing temples, sevas, prasada distribution, donations, and events to handling suppliers, payroll, and inventory, the system centralizes all workflows in one place. With role-based access for admins, priests, staff, and devotees, it ensures secure and efficient management. Integrated reports and analytics provide complete visibility, supporting both spiritual and operational excellence.

en.title: Project Management
en.text: The Project Management System is a smart solution designed to simplify workplace collaboration and productivity. With modules for projects, calendars, employee management, vacations, and real-time messaging, it streamlines communication and task tracking. The Info Portal and Support features ensure employees stay informed and connected, while the dashboard provides a clear overview of progress and performance. Built for efficiency, it enables organizations to manage resources, schedules, and teams with ease.

en.title: Real Estate
en.text: The Real Estate Admin Panel is a comprehensive property management solution with role-based access for Admin, Developer, Seller, Buyer, and Agent. Admins oversee the entire ecosystem, developers manage projects, sellers list properties, buyers explore and purchase, while agents connect clients seamlessly. With features for property listings, transactions, user management, and analytics, the platform ensures transparency, efficiency, and smooth real estate operations.

en.title: CRM
en.text: The CRM system is designed with role-based access for Owner, BDM, BDE, DM, and TM, ensuring smooth collaboration and accountability. Owners get full visibility with reports and analytics, BDMs oversee business growth, BDEs manage leads and clients, while DMs and TMs handle tasks and team coordination. The platform streamlines lead management, client interactions, performance tracking, and sales pipelines, making it an all-in-one solution for business development.

en.title: Job Board
en.text: The Job Board Mobile App connects college students, alumni, and management on a single platform. Students can explore job opportunities, alumni can post openings from their companies, and management can engage through announcements and events. With features like job postings, help desk, event creation, member directory, and real-time chat, the app fosters career growth, networking, and smooth communication within the campus community.
